title: Ezhai azhuda
sahitya:
Ezhai azhuda kaNNIr iraivA unadu nenjam iLaga sheyyavillaiyA


anupallavi

  tAzhai maDal viriyum taNpozhip-pazhaniyil vAzhumurugEshA vAsavan marugOnE


caraNam    mAzhaimNi manril mAnilam tOnra shei mAperum kUttanin mAmaNiyE enran 
pizhai aghaTriyE piraviyai aruttALvAi pEsharumei nilaiyE pErinbamE aruLE
